title: After Instagram, group of state attorneys general is investigating TikTok’s effects on kids and teens
content:
TikTok is currently under investigation by a bipartisan group of state attorneys general to understand the negative effects the short-form video platform might have on the health of kids and teens. In addition, the AGs are trying to find whether the app violated state consumer protection laws.

more…

The post After Instagram, group of state attorneys general is investigating TikTok’s effects on kids and teens appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: TikTok is under investigation by a bipartisan group of attorneys general to understand the negative effects on the health of kids and teens.
